buyYes().details: Uses CPMM formula: dy = y - (x * y) / (x + dx)

buyNo().notice: Buy NO shares using native token (PHAR)

buyYes().notice: Buy YES shares using native token (PHAR)

estimateBuyYes(uint256).notice: Estimate shares received for a given buy amount

getMarketInfo().notice: Get market info as a struct

getNoPrice().notice: Get current NO price (0-100 representing probability %)

getYesPrice().notice: Get current YES price (0-100 representing probability %)

sellNo(uint256).notice: Sell NO shares back to the AMM
